reviews.review: Eventhough it is an old game, it is still very much fun and exciting to play.

The best first person shooter ever made.

¬°¬°¬°ESTA BUENISIMO!!! ya me lo e pasado todo, es un clasico de clasicos, aunque me gustaria un boton de borrar por si quiero volver a jugarlo y no me ocupa memoria, en cuanto a la comunidad la veo bastante bien para se un juego de los 90s, pero bueno en fin es bueno si te gustan los clasicos recomendado.

One of the best games ever I remeber being a wayne when I was playing this the first time

Very good game, in my opinion best game ever, I'm on mac so game compatibility is key, graphics are still good after all these years and low system requirements help a lot. Thank you Valve for your games and services, as a young developer you inspire, so thank you
One of the best classic FPS games of all time

There are many games that can be called the best there are some people who like COD and some who like (dare I say it) the last of us part 2 but there is one company who have always made lightning in a bottle when it comes to a release and that company is valve. it was days like these when founder Gabe newel worked for Microsoft but at the time when classic FPS games like DOOM and Quake and Duke Nukem, were hitting shelves so Gabe quit Microsoft and quit his university to try and master what id did a few years ago, soon he came up with an idea a scientist and his daring escape out of his workplace. fighting a horde of monsters and aliens soon writer Marc laid law came in and together and a few other people they created... Half-Life

Half life takes place in the black mesa research facility where you are late for work and to add salt to the injury your co workers are confused and furious when you do arrive the entire sector is full of busy scientists and security guarding the uncharted, "There waiting for you Gordon... in the test chamber!" as soon as your in "The barrel" your given a specimen from the far reaches from XEN a border world filled with creatures and monsters all of a sudden explosions and portals start ripping all over the facility your life is now at stake...

your Friends dead the creatures roaming ll over the facility your option?... ESCAPE! as your wander back through the facility your greeted with your only friend and your key to victory a crowbar sleek shiny forged by fire and sent down upon your in your most desperate time of need sure you also have guns but shes practically perfect in every way. but whats what Gordon faces will be tough but you do have the suit to handle such travesty. the mark 4 hazardous environment suit or HEV for short is suited for hazardous jobs your given your shield at the start of the game. an icon for what this game has in store and anyone. the Enemy you'll be facing are of course the creatures from XEN but are sometimes usually quite easy to handle with other forces that you will become face to face with are a non alien threat. the HECU are soldiers who are here to clean up the resonance cascade but what the survivors don't know is that they are hostiles to them and will resolve by killing you

the landscape and environment is a little old for our time but in 1998 this was the top of gaming. The puzzles are oblivious to the seen to the weakest eyes of gamers and the platforming is well... A challenge to noobs, but what do they know about masterpieces ultimately Half life comes out to be a beacon to all who start off their journey

10/10
A classic. Everyone has to play this and the sequel at least once.

The grandfather to games such as 'CS:GO' and 'Team Fortress' 

This game was an absolute gem back on its original console release and though admittedly now dated, gives you a sense of nostalgia akin to that of the old Halo games. 

If you're looking for a more updated and modern experience i would recommend the 'Black Mesa' game here on steam, but if you want to relive a true golden classic about shooting aliens in there 'Undefined Organs' then you would be mad not to pick this up!
This game was amazing for its time. Now, I think it's just fine, but it's definitely an experience every gamer should have.

its fun

What can i say that wasn't said already? Half life is an instant classic. Like Quake, or doom, is a game that you will always feel compelled to go back to. It's a game that knows how to put up a good fight. But also play a really good narrative experience in the middle almost with no story breaks in the middle. This is a game about shooting ugly aliens and overly talkative soldiers. And never tries to go too far into a story, because it knows it doesn't need to. Instant recommendation.

As an extra note. played both Black mesa and this game recently back to back. And i still prefer this game despite BM being cool and all. Butblack mesa Xen segment was WAY too long. This game ends every segment before you get tired of each. And that something to appreciate. Know when you gotta end a setpiece..
